thread.title: Was Lamar Odom forced into drug overdose by brothel?
thread.title_full: Was Lamar Odom forced into drug overdose by brothel?

author: NewsWire
title: Was Lamar Odom forced into drug overdose by brothel?
text:
0 0 0 0 0 
Washington D.C., Oct 25 (ANI): Now when Lamar Odom is doing well and the case is getting interrogated, an issue has come forward that Love Ranch brothel paired the player with two such hookers, who had a bad reputation for partying and forced him into drug overdose. 
The sources informed that when the NBA star reached at the brothel the girls were put in a lineup so he could choose his partners for the night, but the brothel officials influenced the basketball player into picking 2 specific girls who were known to tolerate drug use, TMZ.com reported. 
Also, other girls later complained that brothel management should not have pushed a the Lakers player, who already has a drug addict history, into choosing women who would take him down a bad path, the source informed. 
Though, the 2 hookers, who cavorted with Odom, are on suspension after allegedly lying to management about possible drug use in his room. (ANI) Related Posts
